findings.quote: the bar of 'human intellectuals' is just really low
findings.issue: Strong foundational claim made without any supporting evidence or data

findings.quote: we need to get the basic shape of the conversation right. Later we can bring out more hard data
findings.issue: Admits to lacking hard data while making sweeping claims throughout the document

findings.quote: Neglected: Few groups are actively pursuing this direction
findings.issue: Claims neglectedness without evidence or survey of current efforts

findings.quote: Many people seem to hold this belief implicitly, but when pressed, few provide concrete arguments
findings.issue: Makes claim about what "many people" believe without evidence or citations

findings.quote: most executives spend less than 20% of their time on high-level strategy
findings.issue: Specific statistical claim about executive time allocation without any citation

findings.quote: but I haven't found these arguments particularly compelling
findings.issue: Dismisses serious counterarguments about AI alignment without substantive engagement

findings.quote: There seems to be a decent segment of doomers
findings.issue: Uses pejorative term "doomers" to characterize opponents rather than engaging arguments

findings.quote: My guess is that most of these aren't that serious and don't represent cruxes
findings.issue: Lists 5 substantive counterarguments then dismisses all without addressing any

findings.quote: Consider how self-driving technology has evolved
findings.issue: Uses analogy without establishing relevance to intellectual work automation

findings.quote: The most popular intellectuals...are arguably much better at marketing than they are at research
findings.issue: Makes broad claim about intellectual competence without evidence

findings.quote: intellectual work that's highly accurate has a very small and often negative mimetic advantage
findings.issue: Strong claim about accuracy being disadvantageous without supporting evidence

findings.quote: Often, conventional wisdom is pretty decent
findings.issue: Directly contradicts earlier claim that human intellectual bar is "really low"

findings.quote: I believe that AI systems will soon be able to outperform them on both capabilities and benevolence
findings.issue: Makes prediction about AI benevolence without evidence or explanation

findings.quote: In some technical sense, perhaps. But this form of delegation has been overwhelmingly positive
findings.issue: Dismisses serious concern about loss of control without substantive analysis

findings.quote: I suspect many aren't actually cruxes for most skeptics
findings.issue: Dismisses unaddressed objections by speculating about opponents' true motivations

findings.quote: the specific objections people raise often aren't their true bottlenecks
findings.issue: Claims objections aren't genuine rather than engaging with them substantively
